But this is not DLC, as that requires the original game.  This is a mini version of the game, that they could not even be bothered to tie into the main game.  You do not get to use what you find in this addon, so what is the point?  It is nothing more than an example of what the original game should have been like (proper level design & graphics).  

Thanks for the share.  

It would be worth buying if it were actually tied into the game.  I agree, that pausing your regular game, and playing this one at the correct point, is the only way to enjoy this.
